Contains the MenuItem class, which represents menu data; the MenuBar control class; and the PopupMenu class, which is used to provide immediate context menus. More...

Detailed Description

Contains the MenuItem class, which represents menu data; the MenuBar control class; and the PopupMenu class, which is used to provide immediate context menus.
